```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
n <- as.integer(Sys.getenv("n", 100L))
nWorkers <- as.integer(Sys.getenv("nWorkers", 4L))
```

# Introduction
test message

```{r, echo=FALSE}
files <- list.files("../results", full.names = TRUE)
referenceFile <- files[grepl("parLapply", files)]
otherFiles <- files[!grepl("parLapply", files)]
timeTable <- readRDS(referenceFile)
for(i in otherFiles){
    timeTable <- rbind(timeTable, readRDS(i))
}


timeTable$performance <- timeTable$time[1]/timeTable$time * 100
name <- colnames(timeTable)
name[name == "time"] <- "time(sec)"
name[name == "performance"] <- "performance(%)"


knitr::kable(timeTable, format = "markdown",
             caption = paste0("n:", n, ", workers:", nWorkers),
             col.names = name)
```
